attributes.action: Leave the EU with immediate effect, or, failing that, to refuse the EU Constitution
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe the EU Constitution will undermine the UK's independence of country, government and freedom. We think British laws shoud be made in Britain, NOT Brussels. The EU is bad for this country, has damaged our national freedom and gives us no apparent benefits. It blocks us from the death penalty. Hear this, Blair, and do what it says or an annoyed 13 yr-old will be at your door.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
